member.name: T:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension
member.summary: Extension for that adds support for natural sorting.

member.name: M:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension.WithNaturalSort(System.StringComparer)
member.summary: Enhances string comparer with natural sorting functionality, which allows it to sort numbers inside the strings as numbers, not as letters. (e.g. "1", "2", "10" instead of "1", "10", "2")
member.returns: Returns comparer of strings that considers natural sorting.

member.name: F:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension.NaturalSortComparer._stringComparer
member.summary: String comparer used for comparing strings.

member.name: F:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension.NaturalSortComparer.NumberSequenceRegex
member.summary: Regex to find sequences of numbers to split.

member.name: M:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension.NaturalSortComparer.Tokenize(System.String)
member.summary: Splits inputs into tokens, where each token is either a number or a piece of string.

member.name: M:NaturalSort.Extension.StringComparerNaturalSortExtension.NaturalSortComparer.ParseNumberOrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Parses string as a number, or returns 0 otherwise.
